plot: 18-year old girl, called Slavka, born in a small northern town, comes to Moscow - to become a singer or a real pop-star. She got no cash, but just the business card of one of the most famous music producer, called Larisa. But Slavka appears to be quite pushy, and gets herself onboard Larisa. And suddenly psycho shock happens - 48-year old Larisa recognizes herself and her own youth in a teen age ...
title: Popsa
